listener_info Struct Reference

#include <listen.h>


Data Fields

int sock
struct sockaddr_in * client_addr
struct client_record * client_db_rec
struct client_db * db

Detailed Description

The information passed by listener_handle_packet() to the callee.

Field Documentation

struct sockaddr_in* listener_info::client_addr [read]

The originating address of the packet (won't be NULL).

struct client_record* listener_info::client_db_rec [read]

The DB record corresponds to listener_info::client_addr (NULL if the client is not yet maintained).

struct client_db* listener_info::db [read]

The book-keeping DB (won't be NULL).

int listener_info::sock

The socket from which the callee must take one and only one packet.
